description: Demolition of garage and conservatory and erection of part single storey, part two storey side and rear extension with associated changes to fenestration
decision_conditions: Development  shall  be  carried  out  in  accordance  with  the  materials  specified  on  the approved plans and on the application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.

Prior to beneficial occupation of the development to which this permission relates, any new windows or rooflights at first floor level or above in the eastern flank elevation shall be constructed so that no part of the framework less than 1.7m above finished floor level shall be openable. Any part below that level shall be fitted with and permanently retained in obscure glazing to a minimum of level 3 on the standard scale. Any film used to achieve the requisite obscurity level shall be non-perishable, tamper-proof, and shall be replaced immediately in the event that it ceases to result in obscurity to level 3.Reason: To ensure satisfactory living conditions for neighbouring occupiers, in accordance with policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The flat roof element(s) of the extensions hereby permitted shall not be converted or used as a balcony or a sitting out area, and no access shall be gained except for maintenance purposes.Reason: To protect the amenities and privacy of the adjoining residential properties in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
Condition 26 (Vehicular access/Footway) - RBK Neighbourhood engineer has reviewed the information provided and is satisfied this can now be approved.
Sketch Plan - Please add the location of the Oak tree to the sketch plan, and label each tree T.1 and T.2 as per the application form.

For the avoidance of doubt, please confirm the description 'Demolition of existing two buildings (Use Class E(G), erection of 4nos dwellings with roof terraces and commercial unit (Use Class E) with associated parking, bin and cycle storage. Installation of solar panels.'
